Package frc.team_8840_lib.listeners

Class FrameworkUtil

java.lang.Object
frc.team_8840_lib.listeners.FrameworkUtil
public class FrameworkUtil extends Object
This class is supposed to be the framework of what will make the library work. This will be returned from "no8840LibEventListener"

    • subscribeFixedPhase

      public void subscribeFixedPhase(Callback method, GamePhase phase)

    • subscribeFixedPhase

      public void subscribeFixedPhase(TimerTask timerTask, GamePhase phase)
      Due to the nature of periodic tasks (called 3500 to 4000 times per second), it's hard to get an accurate time for timing each call. By using a fixed rate, we can get a more accurate time for each call, which is extremely useful for things like PID and other control loops. This also puts less strain on the CPU since it's only called every 0.03125 seconds (32 times per second), about 1/100th of the time it's called in the other loop. This is also useful for things like logging, AI and other things that don't need to be called as often.

    • getDSControlWord

      public edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DSControlWord getDSControlWord()
